name: Robot Invasion (Sampsa, Razer1, Max Johansson, Ilmanraikastin)
name_original: Robot Invasion (Sampsa, Razer1, Max Johansson, Ilmanraikastin)
description:
It was a typical day in the city, but everything changed after our own technology froze time and robots took over the world and power. You find yourself in a ghost town, then, all of a sudden, out of nowhere, a group of bots starts to chase you. You realize you're the only one who can't get influenced by time.

Quick. Destroy at least eighteen (18) bots using your weapon, and you are guaranteed to take back control and win your possible last war against technology.

Controls:

   WASD - Move

   ctrl, right-click - shoot

   scroll - zoom

Credits: 

   Synty Store -  3D assets, Demo scene

   Erkka Kröger - Sound design, music, and sound effects

   Vilma Heiskanen - Art, 2D art 

   Max Johansson - Game programmer, animation implementation

   Sampsa Simula - Game programmer assistant
